description:
runtime: disable memory profiler in gc_test

This lets the test pass on PPC64 GNU/Linux, which uses a much
larger page size and thus uses more memory to hold blocks
allocated for memory profiling.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=78de080a36fb ***

runtime: disable memory profiler in gc_test

This lets the test pass on PPC64 GNU/Linux, which uses a much
larger page size and thus uses more memory to hold blocks
allocated for memory profiling.

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6048054

subject: code review 6048054: runtime: disable memory profiler in gc_test
